thread.title: Gergely Szabo
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Gergely Szabo

author: Gergely Szabo
title: Gergely Szabo
text: I bought today mad max . Frist i cant pay with my credit card, there was an error, then i bought via paypal as quest chekout. It was succesful. Now at my order it say status: manual authorization , i dont get my key. I never have problem on any other key site until now bundlestars the first where i have problem.I dont recommend this site anyone, you dont get your key asap, i think it is unacceptable.
